comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The date on the photo (in reverse) is June 21, 1913. 1913 was the year Schmedeman was appointed U. S. Minister to Norway.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information and for noting the date on the negative. We can add it to the description when we update it. (Apparently Schmedeman's appointment as U.S. Minister to Norway wasn't entirely well received. A New York Times article from July 8, 1913 indicates that some Norwegians and Norwegian Americans opposed the appointment: http://query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9C03EEDF163DE633A2575BC0A9619C946296D6CF.)
